verbose_text: To check whether PCNA is re-loaded continuously on unligated Okazaki fragments, we induced expression of myc tagged PCNA in S or G2 phase in the absence of Cdc9 (XREF_FIG C and 4D) and monitored PCNA loading (assessed by the appearance of PCNA-3myc SUMOylated forms in whole cell extracts; XREF_FIG E, 4F, and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
